import { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux" import Calendar from "react-calendar" import { createBug } from "../../redux/actions/userActions" import "react-calendar/dist/Calendar.css" import { userReducer } from "../../redux/reducers/userReducer" import Header from "../Header/Header" const CreateBug = (props) => { const titleRef = useRef() const statusRef = useRef() const typeRef = useRef() const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) const [image, setImage] = useState("") const [date, setDate] = useState(new Date()) const dispatch = useDispatch() const url = process.env.REACT_APP_CREATE_BUG const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("profile")) console.log(user.email) const onChange = (e) => { setImage(e.target.files[0]) } const onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() let formData = new FormData() formData.append("creator", user.email) formData.append("title", titleRef.current.value) formData.append("status", statusRef.current.value) formData.append("type", typeRef.current.value) formData.append("deadline", date.toLocaleDateString()) formData.append("file", image) dispatch(createBug(url, formData, setLoading, setImage)) } useEffect(() => { console.log(image) }, [image]) return ( <>

BUG

{/* depends on type */}
{console.log(date.toLocaleDateString())} {/* only .gif and .png */}
) } export default CreateBug
